name: RTX 3090 Graphics Card
description: The Nvidia RTX 3090 is a high-performance graphics card for gaming and professional tasks with 24GB of GDDR6X memory.

name: RTX 3080 Graphics Card
description: The Nvidia RTX 3080 offers high-end performance for gaming and creative professionals with 10GB of GDDR6X memory.

name: RTX 3070 Graphics Card
description: The Nvidia RTX 3070 delivers incredible performance for 1440p and 4K gaming with 8GB of GDDR6 memory.

name: RTX 3060 Ti Graphics Card
description: The Nvidia RTX 3060 Ti is designed for 1080p and 1440p gaming with 8GB of GDDR6 memory and great ray tracing performance.

name: RTX 2060 Graphics Card
description: The Nvidia RTX 2060 is an affordable option with ray tracing for high-quality 1080p gaming, featuring 6GB of GDDR6 memory.

name: GTX 1660 Ti Graphics Card
description: The GTX 1660 Ti provides excellent performance for 1080p gaming without ray tracing, featuring 6GB of GDDR5 memory.

name: GTX 1650 Graphics Card
description: The GTX 1650 is a budget-friendly option for 1080p gaming, with 4GB of GDDR5 memory.

name: GTX 1080 Ti Graphics Card
description: The GTX 1080 Ti provides top-tier 4K gaming performance with 11GB of GDDR5X memory, perfect for high-end gaming setups.

name: Quadro RTX Graphics Card
description: Nvidia Quadro RTX is a high-end workstation graphics card designed for professional applications with exceptional performance and reliability.

name: RX 6900 XT Graphics Card
description: The Radeon RX 6900 XT is AMD's top-tier graphics card, providing superior 4K gaming and excellent ray tracing performance.

name: RX 6800 Graphics Card
description: The Radeon RX 6800 offers high-performance gaming and outstanding performance at 1440p resolution with 16GB of GDDR6 memory.

name: RX 6700 XT Graphics Card
description: The RX 6700 XT provides a powerful 1440p gaming experience, offering excellent performance with 12GB of GDDR6 memory.

name: RTX 3050 Graphics Card
description: The RTX 3050 is an entry-level graphics card from Nvidia, offering great 1080p gaming performance with 4GB of GDDR6 memory and ray tracing.

name: RTX 2080 Ti Graphics Card
description: The RTX 2080 Ti is a high-end graphics card providing exceptional performance at 4K and great ray tracing capabilities.

name: RX 5700 XT Graphics Card
description: The RX 5700 XT is designed for extreme gaming at 4K resolution, offering excellent performance with 16GB of GDDR6 memory.

name: RX 5600 XT Graphics Card
description: The RX 5600 XT offers great performance for 1080p gaming with 6GB of GDDR6 memory at an affordable price.
